languages.text: {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} does not end the Soldier's movement for the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Enemies adjacent to the starting point of {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} will consider the Soldier their lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} during their next turn.
languages.original_text: В этом {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g} Пробежка не завершает движение солдата. Для противников на клетках, соседних с начальной точкой Пробежки, солдат будет наименее {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} в следующем ходу.

traits.locale_text: Dash does not end the Marksman's movement for the turn. Enemies adjacent to the starting point of Dash will consider the Marksman their lowest priority target during their next turn.
Dash does not end the Marksman's movement for the turn. Enemies adjacent to the starting point of Dash will consider the Marksman their lowest priority target during their next turn.

Dash does not end the Soldier's movement for the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Enemies adjacent to the starting point of Dash will consider the Soldier their lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} during their next turn.

languages.text: В этом {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g} {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Пробежка{/g} не завершает движение солдата. Для противников на клетках, соседних с начальной точкой {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Пробежки{/g}, солдат будет наименее {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} в следующем ходу.

Enemies adjacent to the starting point of {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} will consider the Soldier their lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} during their next turn.

traits.locale_text: В этом {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g} {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Пробежка{/g} не завершает движение солдата. Для противников на клетках, соседних с начальной точкой {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Пробежки{/g}, солдат будет наименее {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} в следующем ходу.
В этом ходу Пробежка не завершает движение стрелка. Для противников на клетках, соседних с начальной точкой Пробежки, стрелок будет наименее приоритетной целью в следующем ходу.

languages.text: {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}急速冲刺{/g}不会使士兵本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}的移动结束。{g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}急速冲刺{/g}起点周围的所有敌人，在其下个回合时，都会将士兵视为优先度最低的目标{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}{/g}。
languages.original_text: {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} does not end the Soldier's movement for the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Enemies adjacent to the starting point of {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} will consider the Soldier their lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} during their next turn.

traits.locale_text: 急速冲刺不会使士兵本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}的移动结束。急速冲刺起点周围的所有敌人，在其下个回合时，都会将士兵视为优先度最低的目标{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}{/g}。

languages.text: {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Carrera{/g} no finaliza el movimiento del soldado en su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Los enemigos adyacentes al punto de inicio de {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Carrera{/g} considerarán al soldado como el {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} con menor preferencia durante su próximo turno.
languages.original_text: {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} does not end the Soldier's movement for the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Enemies adjacent to the starting point of {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} will consider the Soldier their lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} during their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Carrera no finaliza el movimiento del tirador de élite en su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Los enemigos adyacentes al punto de inicio de Carrera considerarán al tirador de élite como el {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} con menor preferencia durante su próximo turno.

languages.text: {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Sprinten{/g} beendet die Bewegung des Soldaten für diesen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} nicht. An den Startpunkt von {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Sprinten{/g} angrenzende Feinde betrachten den Soldaten während ihres nächsten Zugs als niederstes {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} does not end the Soldier's movement for the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Enemies adjacent to the starting point of {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} will consider the Soldier their lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} during their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Sprinten beendet die Bewegung für die {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} nicht. An den Startpunkt von Sprinten angrenzende Feinde betrachten den Scharfschützen während ihrer nächsten Runde als niederstes {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g}.

languages.text: {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Sprint{/g} ne met pas fin au déplacement du soldat dans le cadre du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Les ennemis adjacents au point de départ du {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}sprint{/g} considèrent le soldat comme leur {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible la moins prioritaire{/g} lors de leur tour suivant.
languages.original_text: {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} does not end the Soldier's movement for the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Enemies adjacent to the starting point of {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} will consider the Soldier their lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} during their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Sprint ne met pas fin au déplacement du Tireur d'Élite dans le cadre du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Les ennemis adjacents au point de départ du Sprint considèrent le Tireur d'Élite comme leur {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible la moins prioritaire{/g} lors de leur tour suivant.

languages.text: ダッシュしても、兵士のその{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の移動が終了しない。次のターン、ダッシュ開始地点に隣接している敵からの兵士の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}の優先度が最低になる。
languages.original_text: Dash does not end the Soldier's movement for the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Enemies adjacent to the starting point of Dash will consider the Soldier their lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} during their next turn.

traits.locale_text: ダッシュしても、兵士のその{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の移動が終了しない。次のターン、ダッシュ開始地点に隣接している敵からの兵士の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}の優先度が最低になる。

languages.text: {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Atılım{/g} kabiliyeti Asker'in o {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turdaki{/g} hareketini sonlandırmaz. {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Atılım{/g} kabiliyetinin başlangıç noktasının bitişiğindeki düşmanlar, bir sonraki turlarında Asker'i en düşük {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}öncelikli hedef{/g} olarak görürler.
